summary: The Medical Laboratory Personnel Shortage Relief Act of 2025 aims to address the shortage of medical laboratory personnel in the United States. It amends the Public Health Service Act to: include medical laboratory personnel and services in National Health Service Corps programs; establish medical laboratory health professional target areas; amend the loan repayment program to include medical laboratory personnel; and create a medical laboratory personnel education program to support training and development. This includes grants for education programs, faculty recruitment, and prioritizing entities with innovative teaching approaches.
